official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act for purposes of regulating the sale or lease of time-share intervals.

summary.text: Time-Share Sales Full Disclosure Act - Amends the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act to include time-share intervals, programs, and projects under its provisions. Renames such Act the Time-Share and Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act. Defines time-share interval as: (1) an ownership or leasehold estate in real property devoted to a time-share fee and a time-share lease; or (2) any other contractural right of exclusive occupancy, including a vacation license, prepaid hotel reservation, club membership, limited partnership, or vacation bond. Defines time-share program as an arrangement under which the use, occupancy, or possession of real property is subject to a time-share interval circulated among time-share interval purchasers according to a time schedule occurring annually over any period in excess of three years. Defines time-share project as any real property subject to a time-share program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act for purposes of regulating the sale or lease of time-share intervals.
